article.title: Prospective of colon cancer treatments and scope for combinatorial approach to enhanced cancer cell apoptosis.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which of the following is a limitation of chemotherapy for CRC?
choices: Effective only for small and localized cancerous growth.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which drug prevents the interaction of VEGF with receptors on endothelial cells, thereby inhibiting angiogenesis?
